Jackie sighs.  "You're not dying on my watch, bub!" he mutters, 
retracting one of his hands to extend an interface module from the 
socket.  The device connects to Blackfang's head.  "Computer 
override, activate stasis lock." the Autobot commands, referring to 
Blackie's SL, not his own.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> The sleek black bot drew a smile on his face. He was weak. He had 
been 
> through one battle prior to this one and had not taken the time to 
> heal up.
> 
> Blackfang: Thanks Jack. I hope this does save me...
> 
> He falls unconscious, but not yet in stasis lock.
